means: 使失效( neutralize的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Acidity in soil can be neutralized by spreading lime on it.
sentence.Network_cn: 土壤的酸性可以通过在它上面撒石灰来中和.

sentence.Network_en: This strategy effectively neutralized what the Conservatives had hoped would be a vote - winner.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一策略有效地冲淡了保守党希望在选举中获胜的心态.

sentence.Network_en: The intruder smashed a window to get in and then neutralized the alarm system.
sentence.Network_cn: 闯入者打碎了一扇窗户进来，然后破坏了警报系统。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 什么意思_英语neutrality在线翻译_有道词典... ... neutrophil 嗜中性的 neutralized 中立化的 neutralize 中和；中立化；变无效.

list.abs: 中字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 中国字〖 Chinesecharacters;theChinesewrittenlanguage〗 中和〖 neutralize〗 中华〖 China〗.
老实说我不想用中性（Neutral）来形容它的个性，因为中性就等于没有自己的个性，这对音响器材来说是不可能的，每一种音响器材 …
自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... span n. 指距，跨距；一段时间 neutral a. 中立的；中性的 synchronize vi. 同时发生，同步.
冶金词汇英语翻译(H-N) ... neutralization heat 中和热 neutralizer 中和剂 neutralizing agent 中和剂.
红十字会与红新月会国际联合会_百度百科 ... 公正 Impartiality 中立（neutrality） Neutrality 独立 Independence.

entry.tran: 使无效;使无法正常工作
entry.def: To neutralize something means to prevent it from having any effect or from working properly.

example.ex: The US is trying to neutralize the resolution in the UN Security Council...
example.tran: 美国正试图在联合国安理会使该决议无效。

example.ex: The intruder smashed a window to get in and then neutralized the alarm system.
example.tran: 闯入者打碎了一扇窗户进来，然后破坏了警报系统。

entry.def: When a chemical substance neutralizes an acid, it makes it less acid.

example.ex: Antacids are alkaline and they relieve pain by neutralizing acid in the contents of the stomach.
example.tran: 抗酸剂是碱性的，通过中和胃容物中的酸来减轻疼痛。

means.word_mean: 1. made neutral in some respect; deprived of distinctive characteristics

auth_sentence.content: If you're right, the hostiles will be severely disadvantaged if not flat out neutralized.
